unnormalised: The Income Tax Dept. seems to be playing hide-and-seek with PAN cards again! Sources say that almost 10% of PANs linked to businesses in Mumbai are showing up as "invalid" or "dormant" on the official portal. Some are blaming it on technical glitches, others on plain old carelessness. Either way, chaos reigns supreme! One irate businessman, Mr. Sharma, was overheard saying his GSTIN is more useful than his PAN these days – high praise indeed.
